title: Episode 23: How To Feel Authentically Connected To People You Love
description:
We are all in desperate need of connection. Recent events have had us more lonely, isolated, and disillusioned than ever. In this episode, we talk about building emotional intimacy and trust. If you’re ready for relationship upgrades, this ones for you.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

PRE-ORDER HOW TO MEET YOURSELF:

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

BUY HOW TO DO THE WORK:

https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/006301209X

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012

Get my FREE Future Self Journal:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/
